SALE! SALE! SALE! The Charm trait
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Hospital (Illnesses/Characteristics): SALE! SALE! SALE! The Charm trait
This was a discussion about the amazingly useful Charisma Characteristic.
By GoldenBoy on Sunday, December 8, 2002 - 09:54 am:

I just looked at something I had been meaning to
check and now I am kicking myself hard for not
doing it sooner.
I advise you all to make a monster with Charm and
keep it in your freezer. If you want to buy
items, bring it to the ranch and go shopping. It
gives a whopping 33% discount to everything!

This knocks over 20000G off the price of the most
expensive items folks. Holy Cup- normally 65000G
now 43333G!!!!!!!!

The only password monster I have in my book with
Charm is a
Manirin (Suzerin/Raiden) the pass: onotop

I will be looking for a base breed with charm to
keep around, and when I see it I'll be sure to
post it. Man, I wish I had figured this out
before I bought all my expensive items.
